categories.description: Women wearing structured blazers, gathering together to support empowerement movements on the red carpet and feeling confident in minimalist pencil dresses made by independent and ethical brands – during the past few seasons, power dressing got a whole new meaning to it. To help you find the pieces for your personal “power closet”, we created an essentials list inspired by one of our style heroes, Meghan Markle.

Women wearing structured blazers, gathering together to support empowerement movements on the red carpet and feeling confident in minimalist pencil dresses made by independent and ethical brands – during the past few seasons, power dressing got a whole new meaning to it. To help you find the pieces for your personal “power closet”, we created an essentials list inspired by one of our style heroes, Meghan Markle.
